Portfolio

What I've been working on.

These are some of the projects in my portfolio that I've been working on. For a complete look at all my work, be sure to check my GitHub.

Tatafo blog

(Interface Design , Front-End & Back-End)


I designed and programmed a full-stack gossip ("tatafo") news/ blog website to allow users access the latest news easily and quickly. I utilized bright colors in the design to give users warm emotions.


view website | view code

Personal Website

(Interface Design & Front-End)


I focused on a simple but beautiful interface for my personal website. I wanted to potray my creative mind while still staying true to my professionalism.


view website | view code

Bloombank

(Interface Design, Front-End & Back-End)


I used a formal user-interface design for this fullstack web application called Bloombank to allow users bank online.


view website | view code

Get In Touch.

I'm currently available for freelance work.

If you need to get any project done, I'm just a click away.

Hire me today to create your dream personal or commercial website, mobile app or AI software.



CONTACT ME
) } export default Portfolio;
